channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for POPTV, 1–28 June 2020 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 3–4 seats
  • Lista Marjana Šarca (RE): 1–2 seats
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 1–2 seats
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 1–2 seats
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek (RE): 0 seats
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije (RE): 0–1 seats
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (NI): 0 seats
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for POPTV, 1–28 June 2020 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
item.description: TBD

item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for POPTV, 1–28 June 2020 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 23.7–30.1%
  • Lista Marjana Šarca (RE): 13.8–19.2%
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 11.0–15.9%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 11.9–17.0%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 5.9–9.9%
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek (RE): 1.9–4.4%
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije (RE): 5.6–9.4%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (NI): 4.4–7.8%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 2.1–4.8%

  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (NI): 1.2–3.2%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 2.9–5.9%
